personalProfile: Software Developer with a passion for creative apps and community.

projects.title: Markov Twain
projects.tech: Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Mongoose, Jest, Markov
projects.description: Used a Markov Chain to creative a predictive text Twitter bot that used the material of numerous notable authors found in the Creative Commons. This was a group effort in which we mob programmed a majority of the app. My primarily contributions was working on the Mongoose Models/Methods and Twit NPM.

projects.title: Offbeat
projects.description: ThisÂ was a group project that was created entirely in Vanilla JavaScript. The product was a music sampler and sequencer. With no database, we utilized localStorage to save a user's sequences. My primary contribution was creating the Vanilla JS sequencer array loop that would play an audio sample on-time with the BPM.
